creator: Plato (Πλάτων)
description:
LibriVox recording of Sophist by Plato (Πλάτων). (Translated by Benjamin Jowett.)
Read in English by Geoffrey Edwards
Sophist (Ancient Greek: Σοφιστής) discusses being and not-being while drawing a distinction between the philosopher and the sophist. - Summary by Geoffrey Edwards
For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording.

For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.
subject: librivox; audiobooks;plato philosophy metaphysics greek god
title: Sophist
